datasets.name: 4e20b71d
queryLines:
-- drop table if exists hurcy.default.instance_workload_profiles_tb;

-- create table hurcy.default.instance_workload_profiles_tb as
-- with tmp_instance_stats as (
--   select
--     cluster_id,
--     driver,
--     node_type,
--     date_trunc('minute', start_time) as start_time,
--     count(instance_id) as node_count_per_minute -- auto-scale 일 경우에 유용
--   from
--     system.compute.node_timeline
--   where
--     start_time >= current_date() - interval 7 days
--     and workspace_id = '984752964297111'
--     and driver = FALSE -- 드라이버 제외
--   group by
--     cluster_id,
--     driver,
--     node_type,
--     date_trunc('minute', start_time)
-- ),
-- tmp2_instance_stats as (
--   select
--     cluster_id,
--     driver,
--     node_type,
--     round(avg(node_count_per_minute), 2) as avg_node_count,
--     round(max(node_count_per_minute), 2) as max_node_count,
--     round(stddev(node_count_per_minute), 2) as stddev_node_count
--   from
--     tmp_instance_stats
--   group by
--     cluster_id,
--     driver,
--     node_type
-- ),
-- instance_stats as (
--   SELECT
--     workspace_id,
--     cluster_id,
--     driver,
--     node_type,
--     instance_id,
--     min(start_time) as instance_start_time,
--     max(end_time) as instance_end_time,
--     avg(cpu_user_percent + cpu_system_percent) as avg_cpu_util,
--     max(cpu_user_percent + cpu_system_percent) as max_cpu_util,
--     avg(cpu_wait_percent) as avg_cpu_wait, --`Avg CPU Wait`,
--     max(cpu_wait_percent) as max_cpu_wait, -- `Max CPU Wait`,
--     avg(mem_used_percent) as avg_mem_util, --`Avg Memory Utilization`,
--     max(mem_used_percent) as max_mem_util, -- `Max Memory Utilization`,
--     avg(network_received_bytes) / (1024 ^ 2) as avg_net_mb_rec_minute, --`Avg Network MB Received per Minute`,
--     avg(network_sent_bytes) / (1024 ^ 2) as avg_net_mb_sent_minute, -- `Avg Network MB Sent per Minute`
--     -- 워크로드 프로필 분류
--     CASE
--       -- 1. CPU 집약적: 평균 CPU 사용률이 60%를 초과하고, 메모리 사용률은 상대적으로 낮음
--       WHEN
--         avg(cpu_user_percent + cpu_system_percent) > 60
--         AND avg(mem_used_percent) < 50
--       THEN
--         'CPU Intensive'
--       -- 2. 메모리 집약적: 평균 메모리 사용률이 60%를 초과하고, CPU 사용률은 상대적으로 낮음
--       WHEN
--         avg(mem_used_percent) > 60
--         AND avg(cpu_user_percent + cpu_system_percent) < 50
--       THEN
--         'Memory Intensive'
--       -- 3. 균형 잡힌 고부하: CPU와 메모리 모두 높은 사용률을 보임
--       WHEN
--         avg(cpu_user_percent + cpu_system_percent) > 60
--         AND avg(mem_used_percent) > 60
--       THEN
--         'Balanced - High Utilization'
--       -- 4. 저활용: CPU와 메모리 모두 지속적으로 낮은 사용률을 보임 (기존 로직)
--       WHEN
--         avg(cpu_user_percent + cpu_system_percent) < 30
--         AND avg(mem_used_percent) < 40
--       THEN
--         'Under-utilized'
--       ELSE 'Balanced - Moderate Utilization'
--     END AS workload_profile
--   FROM
--     system.compute.node_timeline
--   WHERE
--     1 = 1
--     and workspace_id = '984752964297111'
--     and start_time >= date_add(now(), -7) -- 최근 7일 데이터로 분석 범위 제한
--     and driver = FALSE -- 드라이버 제외
--   GROUP BY
--     workspace_id,
--     cluster_id,
--     driver,
--     node_type,
--     instance_id
-- ),
-- instance_workload AS (
--   select
--     c.workspace_id,
--     c.cluster_id,
--     instance_id,
--     driver,
--     node_type,
--     instance_start_time,
--     instance_end_time,
--     avg_node_count,
--     max_node_count,
--     stddev_node_count,
--     avg_cpu_util,
--     max_cpu_util,
--     avg_cpu_wait, --`Avg CPU Wait`,
--     max_cpu_wait, -- `Max CPU Wait`,
--     avg_mem_util, --`Avg Memory Utilization`,
--     max_mem_util, -- `Max Memory Utilization`,
--     avg_net_mb_rec_minute, --`Avg Network MB Received per Minute`,
--     avg_net_mb_sent_minute, -- `Avg Network MB Sent per Minute`
--     workload_profile,
--     t2.policy_id,
--     t2.tags
--   from
--     tmp2_instance_stats as i
--       join instance_stats as c using (cluster_id, driver, node_type)
--       LEFT JOIN (
--         -- This subquery picks the most recent config for each cluster
--         SELECT
--           *,
--           ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY cluster_id ORDER BY change_time DESC) as rn
--         FROM
--           system.compute.clusters
--       ) t2
--         ON t2.cluster_id = c.cluster_id
--         AND t2.rn = 1
--         and t2.workspace_id = c.workspace_id
-- ),
-- exploded_task_runs AS (
--   SELECT
--     tr.workspace_id as workspace_id,
--     tr.job_id,
--     tr.run_id,
--     explode(tr.compute_ids) as cluster_id,
--     tr.period_start_time,
--     tr.period_end_time,
--     tr.termination_code
--   FROM
--     system.lakeflow.job_task_run_timeline tr
--       join (
--         select distinct
--           j.workspace_id,
--           j.job_id,
--           j.name,
--           jt.task_key
--         from
--           system.lakeflow.jobs j
--             LEFT JOIN system.lakeflow.job_tasks jt
--               ON j.workspace_id = jt.workspace_id
--               AND j.job_id = jt.job_id
--       ) j
--         on tr.workspace_id = j.workspace_id
--         and tr.job_id = j.job_id
--   WHERE
--     ARRAY_SIZE(tr.compute_ids) > 0
-- ),
-- task_run_stats as (
--   SELECT
--     tr.workspace_id,
--     tr.cluster_id,
--     tr.job_id,
--     tr.run_id,
--     min(tr.period_start_time) as period_start_time,
--     max(tr.period_end_time) as period_end_time,
--     array_agg(tr.termination_code) as termination_codes
--   FROM
--     exploded_task_runs as tr
--   group by
--     tr.workspace_id,
--     tr.job_id,
--     tr.run_id,
--     tr.cluster_id
--   having
--     array_contains(termination_codes, 'SUCCESS')
-- )
-- select
--   c.workspace_id,
--   c.cluster_id,
--   c.instance_id,
--   c.driver,
--   c.node_type,
--   c.instance_start_time,
--   c.instance_end_time,
--   c.avg_node_count,
--   c.max_node_count,
--   c.stddev_node_count,
--   c.avg_cpu_util,
--   c.max_cpu_util,
--   c.avg_cpu_wait, --`Avg CPU Wait`,
--   c.max_cpu_wait, -- `Max CPU Wait`,
--   c.avg_mem_util, --`Avg Memory Utilization`,
--   c.max_mem_util, -- `Max Memory Utilization`,
--   c.avg_net_mb_rec_minute, --`Avg Network MB Received per Minute`,
--   c.avg_net_mb_sent_minute, -- `Avg Network MB Sent per Minute`
--   c.workload_profile,
--   c.policy_id,
--   c.tags,
--   tr.job_id,
--   tr.run_id,
--   tr.period_start_time,
--   tr.period_end_time,
--   datediff(minute, c.instance_start_time, c.instance_end_time) as cluster_execution_minutes,
--   datediff(minute, tr.period_start_time, tr.period_end_time) as task_run_duration_minutes
-- from
--   instance_workload c left join task_run_stats tr using (workspace_id, cluster_id)
-- where
--   1 = 1
--   and c.instance_start_time <= tr.period_start_time
--   and tr.period_end_time <= date_add(c.instance_end_time, 1)

datasets.name: 35341dc1
queryLines:
select 'ALL' as policy_id
union all
select distinct policy_id
from
  hurcy.default.instance_workload_profiles_tb as tr
  where policy_id is not null

datasets.name: 0d52ef71
queryLines:
with tmp as (
  select distinct
    c.workspace_id,
    c.cluster_id,
    c.workload_profile,
    c.policy_id,
    min(c.instance_start_time) as cluster_start_time,
    max(c.instance_end_time) as cluster_end_time,
    round(avg(c.avg_node_count), 2) as avg_node_count_per_minute,
    round(max(c.max_node_count), 2) as max_node_count_per_minute,
    round(avg(c.avg_cpu_util), 2) as avg_cpu_util_per_cluster,
    round(max(c.avg_cpu_util), 2) as max_cpu_util_per_cluster,
    round(avg(c.avg_cpu_wait), 2) as avg_cpu_wait_per_cluster,
    round(max(c.avg_cpu_wait), 2) as max_cpu_wait_per_cluster,
    round(avg(c.avg_mem_util), 2) as avg_mem_util_per_cluster,
    round(max(c.avg_mem_util), 2) as max_mem_util_per_cluster,
    round(avg(c.avg_net_mb_rec_minute), 2) as avg_net_mb_rec_minute_per_cluster,
    round(avg(c.avg_net_mb_sent_minute), 2) as avg_net_mb_sent_minute_per_cluster
  from
    hurcy.default.instance_workload_profiles_tb as c
  where
    c.instance_start_time > :from
    and c.instance_end_time < :to
    AND (
      array_contains(:policy_id, 'ALL')
      OR array_contains(:policy_id, c.policy_id)
    )
  group by
    c.workspace_id,
    c.cluster_id,
    c.workload_profile,
    c.policy_id
)
select
  *,
  datediff(minute, cluster_start_time, cluster_end_time) as cluster_execution_minutes
from
  tmp
order by
  workload_profile desc,
  cluster_execution_minutes desc;

datasets.name: 080e18ac
queryLines:
select
  tr.job_id,
  tr.run_id,
  tr.period_start_time,
  tr.period_end_time,
  datediff(minute, tr.period_start_time, tr.period_end_time) as task_run_duration_minutes,
  tr.workload_profile,
  tr.policy_id,
  tr.cluster_id,
  tr.instance_id,
  tr.driver,
  tr.node_type,
  tr.instance_start_time,
  tr.instance_end_time,
  tr.avg_node_count,
  tr.max_node_count,
  tr.stddev_node_count,
  tr.avg_cpu_util,
  tr.max_cpu_util,
  tr.avg_cpu_wait,
  --`Avg CPU Wait`,
  tr.max_cpu_wait,
  -- `Max CPU Wait`,
  tr.avg_mem_util,
  --`Avg Memory Utilization`,
  tr.max_mem_util,
  -- `Max Memory Utilization`,
  tr.avg_net_mb_rec_minute,
  --`Avg Network MB Received per Minute`,
  tr.avg_net_mb_sent_minute, -- `Avg Network MB Sent per Minute`
  case
    when tr.avg_cpu_util < 30 then 'cpu_low_threshold (<30%)'
    when tr.avg_cpu_util <= 60 then 'cpu_mid_threshold (<=60%)'
    when tr.avg_cpu_util > 60 then 'cpu_high_threshold (>60%)'
  end as cpu_metric_level,
  case
    when tr.avg_mem_util < 40 then 'mem_low_threshold (40%)'
    when tr.avg_mem_util <= 60 then 'mem_mid_threshold (60%)'
    when tr.avg_mem_util > 60 then 'mem_high_threshold (60%)'
  end as mem_metric_level
from
  hurcy.default.instance_workload_profiles_tb as tr
where
  tr.period_start_time > :from
  and tr.period_end_time < :to
  AND (
      array_contains(:policy_id, 'ALL')
      OR array_contains(:policy_id, tr.policy_id)
    )
order by 
  workload_profile desc,
  task_run_duration_minutes desc;

lines: # Monitor Job cluster utilization and adjust job cluster policy.

frame.title: Cluster workload profile distribution per policy_id except policy_id is null
